result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Billy J Staves

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
CASES: 15CF132, 14CF74, 14CF432, 14CF323, 14CF75 Defendant Billy J Staves in court with attorney Daniel James Chapman.  Defendant Billy J Staves in custody.  Daniel Patrick Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 2:21pm 

14CF74    Ct 1 w/o repeater- State filed motion to vacate previous plea, Def does not object. Def- plea of NC. State to file Amended Info striking repeater. 
14CF323  Ct 2 w/repeater- Def plea of NC. 
14CF432  Ct 2 w/repeater- Amended Info filed. Def plea of NC.

CT accepts pleas, finds G, enters JOCs. All other cases & Cts DRI. Also, DRI uncharged gas drive off in Barron Cty in amount of $43.07. If DRI'ed in another county and proof provided, will subtract from total. 

CT vacates DC-31 from 14CF75 that is unsigned but date stamped. CT signs DC-31 that State provides. 

SENTENCING: 
14CF74- 3 YRS 6 MOS: 1.5 IC, 2 ES consecutive to 14CF75. DNA surcharge, no sample. 
14CF323: 1 IC, 1 ES- concurrent to 14CF74 and 14CF75. 
14CF432: 1 IC, 1 ES- concurrent to 14CF323 and 14CF74 and 14CF75.

No contact with Walmart in SCF, WI or Vicki Erickson or Rick Madsen.  

no fine/cost on any. 

Atty Chapman to determine sent cred on all files. 3:30pm adj.

Defendant Billy J Staves in court with attorney Daniel James Chapman.  Defendant Billy J Staves in custody.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 10:49am Def withdraws motion for substitution, reqs 14CF74 14CF323 14CF432 15CF132 all go in front of Br 1. CT accepts and transfers 15CF132 to Br 1. bond cont. 10:55am adj.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 23, 2015 at 09:30 am.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: of Judge.  Submitted by Atty Tomtschik.
Not to have contact other than incidental with: Rick Madsen.

Defendant Billy J Staves in court with attorney Shelly Tomtschik.  Defendant Billy J Staves in custody.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 1:29pm May be Atty Chapman's case. Def req Sub of Judge- to be filed w/COCC. 1:32pm adj.
